translations.home.main.title: Develop the mods of your dreams
translations.home.main.description: VOXEL, what is it? These are guides in French, from beginner to advanced level, to learn how to develop mods or enrich your existing knowledge.
translations.home.feature.title: Made by an enthusiast for enthusiasts
translations.home.feature.description: VOXEL is a personal project, created by a Minecraft mod development enthusiast. The goal is to share my knowledge and help you develop your own mods.
translations.home.product.modding.title: Modding Basics - 1.21
translations.home.product.modding.description: Learn the basics of Minecraft modding, from creating simple blocks to adding new features.
translations.home.product.resource.title: Quality Resources
translations.home.product.resource.description: Enhance the quality of your mods by adding quality resources.
translations.home.product.soon: A feature is under development, it will be available soon, stay tuned!

translations.footer.description: VOXEL, what is it? These are guides in French, from beginner to advanced level, to learn how to develop mods or enrich your existing knowledge.
translations.tools.upload.description: Drop your data packs in .zip here to start configuring them.
translations.tools.enchantments.home.description: This tool is designed to modify the enchantments of an existing pack, such as NeoEnchant+ or any other pack, with a simple and user-friendly interface that requires no development knowledge.
translations.tools.enchantments.home.small: NeoEnchant+ is available for download on
translations.tools.enchantments.vanilla: You are modifying native Minecraft content, The modifications will replace the default values. The last three sections are temporarily disabled. They will be supported soon.
translations.tools.enchantments.warning.multiple_file: Please only drop one file at a time
translations.tools.enchantments.warning.mods: Mods are not allowed, please drop a data pack
translations.tools.enchantments.warning.invalid_file: Invalid file, please drop a .zip file
translations.tools.enchantments.sidebar.title: Enchantments
translations.tools.enchantments.section.global.descri: This section contains the settings for enchantments.
translations.tools.enchantments.section.exclusive.des: This section is to define the enchantment slot.
translations.tools.enchantments.section.supported.des: Which items are compatible with this enchantment.
translations.tools.enchantments.section.find.descript: This section contains the settings for finding enchantments.
translations.tools.enchantments.section.yggdrasil.des: This section contains the settings for Yggdrasil enchantments.
translations.tools.enchantments.section.technical.des: This section contains the technical settings for enchantments.
translations.tools.enchantments.section.global.compon: The maximum level of the enchantment.
The rarity of the enchantment in the enchantment table.
The cost of combining two items with this enchantment.
Minimum cost per level above the first
Maximum cost per level above the first
translations.tools.enchantments.section.find.componen: These enchantments can be obtained from the enchanting table.
These enchantments can be found on spawned mob equipment.
These enchantments can be found on naturally generated equipment from loot tables.
These enchantments can be sold by villagers as enchanted books.
These enchantments can be sold by villagers on equipment.
These enchantments are charged twice as much in villager trades.
translations.tools.enchantments.section.yggdrasil.com: When mobs spawn with equipment, they may have these enchantments.
Enchantments easier to find in the Yggdrasil structure.
It is harder to find enchantments in Yggdrasil.
The most difficult, requiring a lot of skill to find enchantments.
translations.tools.enchantments.section.technical.com: These enchantments have a red description.
Used in other tags, random loot, tradeable equipment and book, enchanting table, mob equipment.
Used in other tags, double price and certain loot tables.
Items dropped by mobs are processed by smelting.
Prevent bees from spawning while mining
Used to prevent bees from coming out when mining hive or hive blocks.
Used to prevent decorated pots from dropping bricks and shards when broken with a tool.
Used to prevent ice from turning into water instead of dropping when broken.
Used to prevent silverfish from spawning when breaking infested blocks.
